name: The Fabled Four Finger Discount
description:
you are just out having some quiet you time, when youre accosted by some rando from the sea.

the fabled four finger discount is a short fan game based on the hiveswap: friendsim series with entirely original assets 

if you enjoy this please consider supporting my art by buying me a coffee!
